explains: n. 朝圣者，香客；（Pilgrim）前辈清教徒移民；到某重要地点（或人物居所）参观的人；<文>流浪者，旅客

sentences.en: Pledging to run Pilgrim safely, the company has applied for federal permission to keep it open for another 20 years.
sentences.cn: 为了保证 Pilgrim 的安全运营，该公司已经向联邦政府申请了继续运营20年的许可。

sentences.en: Their family goes back to the time of the Pilgrim Fathers.
sentences.cn: 他们家族的渊源可追溯到清教徒前辈移民时代。

sentences.en: This weekend course will be of value to everyone interested in the Pilgrim Route.
sentences.cn: 这个周末课程对于每一个对朝圣路线感兴趣的人来说都将是重要的。
